Break [i](When this creature deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on up to one other target creature.)[/i]
If one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on a creature you control, that many plus one +1/+1 counters are put on that creature instead.
When Vandham dies, it deals X damage to each opponent where X is the number of creatures you control with counters on them.
notes: 2.2.0: Break changed and the green-red archetype changed too. Now vandham is a hardened scales and his death trigger does something more explicitly red.
